Posts.Content: Feb 8, 2012 05:58AM Jen40 wrote: I am just half way through this chemo treatment and we had to stop. My blood counts were too low, had to delay 4 times. Onc said it was killing my bone marrow. I experienced nausea vomiting and fatigue. It has not been fun. I'm 3 weeks out and still not feeling good but it could also be that I'm weaning off steroids. I hope you do well. The chemo was working even half way through. The little buggers in my liver and chest shrunk or disappeared.
